meanings.sent1: This cake is very shareable among friends.
meanings.sent2: The link to the document is easily shareable with the team.
meanings.sent3: The shareable snacks disappeared quickly at the party.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness is as shareable as a warm hug.
meanings.sent5: The joy of music is truly shareable with everyone.

meanings.sent1: The large pizza is definitely shareable for the whole family.
meanings.sent2: The photo album is a shareable memory for all of us.
meanings.sent3: The shareable jokes made everyone laugh together.
meanings.sent4: His stories are as shareable as a good book.
meanings.sent5: The beautiful sunset is a shareable moment with loved ones.
